DOC.brief_summary: The generic formulation atorvastatin ( Atorva® ) 20mg inferior brand formulation atorvastatin ( Lipitor® ) 20mg 8-week treatment hyperlipidemic Korean patient . In PP analysis , LDL cholesterol goal achievement rate significantly high Atorva group . Both treatment well tolerate .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Atorva® 20mg Versus Lipitor® 20mg
DOC.criteria: Eligible patient men woman age 20 79 year achieve LDL cholesterol goal use National Cholesterol Education Program Adult Treatment Panel Ⅲ ( NCEPATP Ⅲ ) guideline , treatment goal LDL cholesterol < 100 mg/dL patient coronary artery disease ( CAD ) CADequivalent disease , < 130 mg/dL patient multiple risk factor ( 10year coronary heart disease [ CHD ] risk ≤20 % ) , < 160 mg/dL patient 0 1 risk factor . Exclusion criterion follow : currently take kind antihyperlipidemic drug ( within 4 week enrollment ) ; hypersensitivity intolerance atorvastatin HMGCoA reductase inhibitor ; newly diagnose ( within 3 month enrollment ) uncontrolled diabetes ( hemoglobin A1C > 9 % ) ; uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg ) ; hepatic dysfunction ( alanine aminotransferase [ ALT ] aspartate aminotransferase [ AST ] level ≥2 time upper limit normal [ ULN ] ) ; unexplained serum creatinine kinase ( CK ) elevation > 2 time ULN , chronic renal failure ( serum creatinine concentration > 2.5 mg/dL ) ; patient experience operation time screening , patient must result lipid profile within 24 hour 6 week ; history malignancy cervical dysplasia ; pregnant breastfeeding woman ; woman childbearing potential use adequate method contraception ; history drug abuse alcoholism ; participation study 4 week enrollment . Patients could also exclude participation consider inappropriate study physician .
